page.title: 06A TRIP TO THE BLACKSMITH
page.content:
The trip to the blacksmith's was very good because it showed you how to make {horseshoes. }His name was {Mr Laidlaw and he worked in{Avon}at a forge. Mr Laidlaw was a very nice man because he showed us how to do it. The back shoe has two clips because it has pressure in more than one place and the front shoe has only one clip because there is only forward pressure.
We asked him some questions and one of them was "do you make any other things like gates and candleholders?" His answer was that he used to make things like that but he does not do it any more because he has not got enough time!
......Continued......
